card.name: Abnormal Endurance
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control."

card.name: Act of Treason
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

card.name: Aegis of the Heavens
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+7 until end of turn.

card.name: Aerial Engineer
card.text: As long as you control an artifact, Aerial Engineer gets +2/+0 and has flying.

card.name: Aethershield Artificer
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

card.name: Aether Tunnel
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.

card.name: Aggressive Mammoth
card.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Other creatures you control have trample.

card.name: Air Elemental
card.text: Flying

card.name: Ajani, Adversary of Tyrants
card.text: +1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. -2: Return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. -7: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, create three 1/1 white Cat creature tokens with lifelink."

card.name: Ajani's Influence
card.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature. Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a white card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Ajani's Last Stand
card.text: Whenever a creature or planeswalker you control dies, you may sacrifice Ajani's Last Stand. If you do, create a 4/4 white Avatar creature token with flying. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard this card, if you control a Plains, create a 4/4 white Avatar creature token with flying.

card.name: Ajani's Pridemate
card.text: Whenever you gain life, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

card.name: Ajani's Welcome
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Ajani, Wise Counselor
card.text: +2: You gain 1 life for each creature you control. -3: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. -9: Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is your life total.

card.name: Alpine Moon
card.text: As Alpine Moon enters the battlefield, choose a nonbasic land card name. Lands your opponents control with the chosen name lose all land types and abilities, and they gain "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Amulet of Safekeeping
card.text: Whenever you become the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {1}. Creature tokens get -1/-0.

card.name: Angel of the Dawn
card.text: Flying When Angel of the Dawn enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain vigilance until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause them to tap.)

card.name: Anticipate
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Apex of Power
card.text: Exile the top seven cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast nonland cards exiled this way. If this spell was cast from your hand, add ten mana of any one color.

card.name: Arcades, the Strategist
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever a creature with defender enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card. Each creature you control with defender assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power and can attack as though it didn't have defender.

card.name: Arcane Encyclopedia
card.text: {3}, {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Arisen Gorgon
card.text: Arisen Gorgon has deathtouch as long as you control a Liliana planeswalker. (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.text: Flying Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Aven Wind Mage gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Aviation Pioneer
card.text: When Aviation Pioneer enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

card.name: Banefire
card.text: Banefire deals X damage to any target. If X is 5 or more, this spell can't be countered and the damage can't be prevented.

card.name: Befuddle
card.text: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Chaos Wand

card.name: Radiating Lightning
card.text: Radiating Lightning deals 3 damage to target player and 1 damage to each creature that player controls.

card.name: Ravenous Harpy
card.text: Flying {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Ravenous Harpy.

card.name: Reassembling Skeleton
card.text: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Reclamation Sage
card.text: When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Recollect
card.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Regal Bloodlord
card.text: Flying At the beginning of each end step, if you gained life this turn, create a 1/1 black Bat creature token with flying.

card.name: Reliquary Tower
card.text: You have no maximum hand size. {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Remorseful Cleric
card.text: Flying Sacrifice Remorseful Cleric: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

card.name: Resplendent Angel
card.text: Flying At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 5 or more life this turn, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying and vigilance. {3}{W}{W}{W}: Until end of turn, Resplendent Angel gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink.

card.name: Revitalize
card.text: You gain 3 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Rhox Oracle
card.text: When Rhox Oracle enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Riddlemaster Sphinx
card.text: Flying When Riddlemaster Sphinx enters the battlefield, you may return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

card.name: Rise from the Grave
card.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

card.name: Rogue's Gloves
card.text: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Root Snare
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

card.name: Runic Armasaur
card.text: Whenever an opponent activates an ability of a creature or land that isn't a mana ability, you may draw a card.

card.name: Rupture Spire
card.text: Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped. When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Rustwing Falcon
card.text: Flying

card.name: Sai, Master Thopterist
card.text: Whenever you cast an artifact spell, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. {1}{U}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Draw a card.

card.name: Salvager of Secrets
card.text: When Salvager of Secrets enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Sarkhan, Dragonsoul
card.text: +2: Sarkhan, Dragonsoul deals 1 damage to each opponent and each creature your opponents control. -3: Sarkhan, Dragonsoul deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker. -9: Search your library for any number of Dragon creature cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Sarkhan, Fireblood
card.text: +1: You may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. +1: Add two mana of any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon spells. -7: Create four 5/5 red Dragon creature tokens with flying.

card.name: Sarkhan's Dragonfire
card.text: Sarkhan's Dragonfire deals 3 damage to any target. Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a red card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Sarkhan's Unsealing
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell with power 4, 5, or 6, Sarkhan's Unsealing deals 4 damage to any target. Whenever you cast a creature spell with power 7 or greater, Sarkhan's Unsealing deals 4 damage to each opponent and each creature and planeswalker they control.

card.name: Sarkhan's Whelp
card.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever you activate an ability of a Sarkhan planeswalker, Sarkhan's Whelp deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Satyr Enchanter
card.text: Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.

card.name: Scapeshift
card.text: Sacrifice any number of lands. Search your library for up to that many land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Scholar of Stars
card.text: When Scholar of Stars enters the battlefield, if you control an artifact, draw a card.

card.name: Serra's Guardian
card.text: Flying Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Other creatures you control have vigilance.

card.name: Shield Mare
card.text: Shield Mare can't be blocked by red creatures. When Shield Mare enters the battlefield or becomes the target of a spell or ability and opponent controls, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Shivan Dragon
card.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Shock
card.text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Siegebreaker Giant
card.text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Sift
card.text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

card.name: Sigiled Sword of Valeron
Silverbeak Griffin
card.text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

card.name: Skalla Wolf
card.text: When Skalla Wolf enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a green card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Skeleton Archer
card.text: When Skeleton Archer enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Skilled Animator
card.text: When Skilled Animator enters the battlefield, target artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5 for as long as Skilled Animator remains on the battlefield.

card.name: Skymarch Bloodletter
card.text: Flying When Skymarch Bloodletter enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Skyrider Patrol
card.text: Flying At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {G}{U}. When you do, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control, and that creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Skyscanner
card.text: Flying When Skyscanner enters the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Sleep
card.text: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.

card.name: Smelt
card.text: Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Snapping Drake
card.text: Flying

card.name: Sovereign's Bite
card.text: Target player loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Sparktongue Dragon
card.text: Flying When Sparktongue Dragon enters the battlefield, you may pay {2}{R}. When you do, it deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Spit Flame
card.text: Spit Flame deals 4 damage to target creature. Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {R}. If you do, return Spit Flame from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Star-Crowned Stag
card.text: Whenever Star-Crowned Stag attacks, tap target creature defending player controls.

card.name: Stitcher's Supplier
card.text: When Stitcher's Supplier enters the battlefield or dies, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.

card.name: Stone Quarry
card.text: Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.name: Strangling Spores
card.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.name: Submerged Boneyard
card.text: Submerged Boneyard enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

card.name: Suncleanser
card.text: When Suncleanser enters the battlefield, choose one - • Remove all counters from target creature. It can't have counters put on it for as long as Suncleanser remains on the battlefield. • Target opponent loses all counters. That player can't get counters for as long as Suncleanser remains on the battlefield.

card.name: Sun Sentinel
card.text: Vigilance

card.name: Supreme Phantom
card.text: Flying Other Spirits you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Sure Strike
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Surge Mare
card.text: Surge Mare can't be blocked by green creatures. Whenever Surge Mare deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. {1}{U}: Surge Mare gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Suspicious Bookcase
card.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {3}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Switcheroo
card.text: Exchange control of two target creatures.

card.name: Take Vengeance
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Talons of Wildwood
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it is attacking.) {2}{G}: Return Talons of Wildwood from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Tattered Mummy
card.text: When Tattered Mummy dies, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Tectonic Rift
card.text: Destroy target land. Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

card.name: Tezzeret, Artifice Master
card.text: +1: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. 0: Draw a card. If you control three or more artifacts, draw two cards instead. -9: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your end step, search your library for a permanent card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library."

card.name: Tezzeret, Cruel Machinist
card.text: +1: Draw a card. 0: Until your next turn, target artifact you control becomes a 5/5 creature in addition to its other types. -7: Put any number of cards from your hand onto the battlefield face down. They're 5/5 artifact creatures.

card.name: Tezzeret's Gatebreaker
card.text: When Tezzeret's Gatebreaker enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a blue or artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. {5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Tezzeret's Gatebreaker: Creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Tezzeret's Strider
card.text: As long as you control a Tezzeret planeswalker, Tezzeret's Strider has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Thorn Lieutenant
card.text: Whenever Thorn Lieutenant becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, create a 1/1 green Elf Warrior creature token. {5}{G}: Thorn Lieutenant gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Thud
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Thud deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.

card.name: Timber Gorge
card.text: Timber Gorge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

card.name: Titanic Growth
card.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Tormenting Voice
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards.

card.name: Totally Lost
card.text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Tranquil Expanse
card.text: Tranquil Expanse enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

card.name: Transmogrifying Wand
card.text: Transmogrifying Wand enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {1}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Transmogrifying Wand: Destroy target creature. Its controller creates a 2/4 white Ox creature token. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Trumpet Blast
card.text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Trusty Packbeast
card.text: When Trusty Packbeast enters the battlefield, return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Two-Headed Zombie
card.text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

card.name: Uncomfortable Chill
card.text: Creatures your opponents control get -2/-0 until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Ursine Champion
card.text: {5}{G}: Ursine Champion gets +3/+3 and becomes a Bear Berserker until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Vaevictis Asmadi, the Dire
card.text: Flying Whenever Vaevictis Asmadi, the Dire attacks, for each player, choose target permanent that player controls. Those players sacrifice those permanents. Each player who sacrificed a permanent this way reveals the top card of their library, then puts it onto the battlefield if it's a permanent card.

card.name: Valiant Knight
card.text: Other Knights you control get +1/+1. {3}{W}{W}: Knights you control gain double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Vampire Neonate
card.text: {2}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Vampire Sovereign
card.text: Flying When Vampire Sovereign enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Viashino Pyromancer
card.text: When Viashino Pyromancer enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Vigilant Baloth
card.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

card.name: Vine Mare
card.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Vine Mare can't be blocked by black creatures.

card.name: Vivien of the Arkbow
card.text: +2: Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target creature. -3: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. -9: Creatures you control get +4/+4 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Vivien Reid
card.text: +1: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. -3: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying. -8: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +2/+2 and have vigilance, trample, and indestructible."

card.name: Vivien's Invocation
card.text: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. When a creature is put onto the battlefield this way, it deals damage equals to its power to target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Vivien's Jaguar
card.text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) {2}{G}: Return Vivien's Jaguar from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if you control a Vivien planeswalker.

card.name: Volcanic Dragon
card.text: Flying Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

card.name: Volley Veteran
card.text: When Volley Veteran enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature an opponent controls equal to the number of Goblins you control.

card.name: Wall of Mist
card.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

card.name: Wall of Vines
card.text: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

card.name: Waterknot
card.text: Enchant creature When Waterknot enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.name: Windreader Sphinx
card.text: Flying Whenever a creature with flying attacks, you may draw a card.

card.name: Woodland Stream
card.text: Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.
